programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep8586
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46704671
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2067
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3648
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2068

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep165
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1047
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep107
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep229230
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep457
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep2425
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamus wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: May Who?

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The Grandmaster of Kungfu
programme.desc: The Eight-Nation Alliance dare not invade Tianjin as it is the homeland of martial arts. To conquer the city, Japan sends its top martial arts master to open a new academy challenging all Chinese masters. Huo Yuan Jia rises to fight, leading the other masters to resist the Japanese and defend the country.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kongs Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Sword Of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Heaven And Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Norbit

programme.title: The Untouchables

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks S1 Ep2

programme.desc: A $4,000 customized fish tank is allegedly delivered damaged to its new owner; when he tries to get another tank, he's offered $200. A man accuses his ex-lover of registering his car under her name.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep41
programme.desc: A pet owner claims his family was horrified to witness the violent death of a beloved teacup Yorkie by a stranger's Pit Bull. A woman is accused of breaking into her ex-friend's garage to retrieve her van.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep42
programme.desc: A man denies slamming his sister's arm in a screen door. After spending five years in jail, a man is accused of owing his ex-lover for bail and an alleged assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep43

programme.title: The Bite S1 Ep3

programme.title: Jo Koy: LIghts Out S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jo Koy's star continues to rise in his second feature-length, uncensored stand-up special, Lights Out.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family.

programme.title: Crawl
programme.desc: As a hurricane tears through Florida, Haley rushes to find her father, who is injured and trapped in the crawl space of their home. They face an even bigger threat lurking below the surface.

programme.title: The Bite S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Third Wave - Rachel attempts to coax confidential CDC information from Zach; Lily tries to continue pursuing her career dreams despite the chaos.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The world needed a hero, we got a hedgehog. Superpowered with speed, Sonic races to save the world and stop evil genius Dr. Robotnik from world domination.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying fathers watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys schools archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: Murders In Rochefort
programme.desc: Police Chief Emma is tasked with the case of a murdered corpse in the forest. However, her partner is a previous one-night-stand. Struggling to keep their emotions in check, the duo fumbles their way through the investigation as more bodies show up.

programme.title: The Traveller: Thief In The Night
programme.desc: Marion was kidnapped on her 8th birthday in Vendee. 29 years later, Judge Elgouarch asked Bareski to resume the investigation because a letter of remorse from the assassin surfaced. Judge Elgouarchs late father was the investigator of the case then.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy theyre babysitting and he disappears never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Blackbird

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelos mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mothers last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Indian Horse
programme.desc: Saul Indian Horse is an indigenous man who was forcefully removed from his family when he was a young boy. Placed in a strict boarding school, he struggles to find peace with his life. He eventually finds salvation in the unlikeliest of places hockey.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: The Traveller: Killer Town
programme.desc: Bareski arrives in a tiny village in the Vosges to investigate the disappearance of a young woman. This disappearance reminds him of the unsolved violent murders of the young Scal family six years ago which caused many inhabitants to flee the village.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Fourth Woman
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in a hops field suspended like in a spider web, and a swimmer is later run over by a motorboat on the lake. Two police officers are sent to investigate the case and they uncover how the two deaths might be related.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Light Years
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their fathers old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: Binti

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden amongst the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. And later, a newbie steals a prize unit out from under our regulars and proves that she's here to play. Then, Brandon and Lori unearth a five-alarm find. If it works, they could be looking at a $20,000 pay day on this item alone.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 10
programme.desc: A covered car lures our buyers to bid big, but the reveal could be more than the winner bargained for. Then, as the temperature climbs to the hottest day of the year, Jesse loses out to Dan on a locker full of expensive tools. But just when it lookslike Jesse is out of the race, he comes back with his biggest score yet. And later, tempers swelter as the final auction of the day pits all of our buyers in a bidding war so intense, one of them cracks under the pressure.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 11
programme.desc: The competition is off with a bang as a locker full of fishing gear sparks fast and furious bidding war that leaves the winner with a surprise catch. Then, Lori butts heads with another bidder, but is it all just a mind-game to try and steal a goldenunit? And later, Papa Bear scoops up a locker for a hefty price, but when he starts digging he quickly discovers his prize possession isn't exactly street legal.

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiance, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 20
programme.desc: Despite the whole family trying to keep it a secret, Sheldon and Missy learn about Georgies pregnancy.

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: "Hereafter" tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George (Matt Damon) is a blue-collar American with a special connection to the afterlife dating from his childhood. On the other side of the world, Marie (Ccile De France), a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when London schoolboy Marcus (Frankie and George McLaren) loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each seeking the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter. Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs this haunting original tale from a screenplay by two-time Oscar nominee Peter Morgan.

programme.title: Making It S2 Ep1
programme.desc: What Are You Made Of? - From executive producers and hosts Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman comes a lighthearted competition celebrating the creativity and craftiness in all of us. Each week, a group of Makers from all over the country will compete in two handmade projects one timed, the other themed cleverly designed by Amy and Nick to test the Makers' ability to get creative. Each challenge will bring out their skills and insights, as well as their touching personal stories and, of course, plenty of laughter and fun for everyone. Then, in the end, one talented artisan will be crowned "Master Maker."

programme.title: Making It (Australia) Ep1
programme.desc: Meet The Makers - From pottery and pyrography to carving, crocheting and even a Chris Hemsworth lampshade, Making It Australia is the new crafting and DIY series, which brings together the countrys most talented Makers to showcase their artistic genius. The show will be hosted by comedian, actor and writer Susie Youssef and comedian, Harley Breen. Joyful and inspiring, the series will celebrate the transformative power of art and craft.

The show will be hosted by comedian, actor and writer Susie Youssef and comedian, Harley Breen. Joyful and inspiring, the series will celebrate the transformative power of art and craft.

programme.desc: Chief Superintendent Tommy Butler assembles a team to try to take down Reynolds and his gang. The discovery of a suitcase containing stolen notes leads to the first arrest whilst a tip-off takes Butler to the farmhouse HQ and a mass of forensic evidence.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Crowded Islands - On rocky islands off the coast of South Africa, thousands of creatures congregate to breed. Among these, huge colonies of cape gannets dominate. Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari - Take a look at one of Africas most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - This island of the coast of Honduras stands out as a vacation resort hot spot. But its not just the sun and sand that brings the tourists in droves. Its actually a divers paradise with shipwrecks scattered from all corners of the the island.

programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - This island of the coast of Honduras stands out as a vacation resort hot spot. But its not just the sun and sand that brings the tourists in droves. Its actually a divers paradise with shipwrecks scattered from all corners of the the island.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Return to the Wild - The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Urban Penguins - Living on the southwestern tip of Africa is an unusual colony of African penguins. Most African penguins prefer to breed on off-shore islands in the region, but human interference on their island homes has caused many birds to look elsewhere for suitable breeding sites.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March of the Crabs - On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades

Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centers aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote thats too people-friendly.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemurs of Anja Mountain - Millions of years ago, castaway creatures found themselves stranded on Madagascars rugged shores. Isolated from the mainland, the newcomers were left to evolve. This is a magical world of rare and unique creatures perfectly adapted to their tropical hideaway.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lemurs of Madagascar - The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wanderers of the Lost Forest - This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Baboons of Bambelela - With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep50
programme.desc: The Time Disruptor - Archibald accidentally uses Loys time travel device, embarking on an adventure through past, present and future. But when the device breaks, hell need to find a way to get back home without disrupting the space-time continuum. / When Archibald returns from his journey through time hes heartbroken to learn that hes no longer the wearer of his beloved sweater. Now, he must travel back through time to correct his mistake before he loses his identity forever.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Grug and Sandy get competitive when town members encroach on their treasure hunting/Gran convinces Grug that she controls the weather, but the power goes to her head when all of Ahhh! Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep50
programme.desc: Lucky and the Endless Possibilities - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep24
programme.desc: Can't Harvey Wait / Bring It Prawn - Lucretia recounts three amazing tales of Harvey Girls fan fiction. Audrey must partner with Zoe in a shrimp-sponsored sibling beauty pageant.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep12
programme.desc: Driven to Distraction / To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep50
programme.desc: The Time Disruptor - Archibald accidentally uses Loys time travel device, embarking on an adventure through past, present and future. But when the device breaks, hell need to find a way to get back home without disrupting the space-time continuum. / When Archibald returns from his journey through time hes heartbroken to learn that hes no longer the wearer of his beloved sweater. Now, he must travel back through time to correct his mistake before he loses his identity forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep63
programme.desc: Snuffnut - Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksys Thing - Rocksys talent goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep112
programme.desc: When The Sky Cried - Buttercup and Daisy decide that it only rains when the sky is upset. They set about trying to cheer the sky up

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep113
programme.desc: Violet's Song - Primrose has composed a song for Violet but is upset when the twins break her guitar. How will she sing for Violet now? Could the twins have the answer

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep114
programme.desc: Poppy's Ice Cream Show - All the tots are picking fruit so Poppy can use it to make her famous ice cream. Stingo thinks he has come up with a much better plan to get hold of some ice cream without having to pick anything will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep115
programme.desc: Painting Practice - Fifi wants to repaint her kitchen but Poppy has run out of paint. Can anybody else come up with an idea to brighten up her walls?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep21
programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep23
programme.desc: Why Won't My Kite Fly? - Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep24
programme.desc: How Did A Dandelion Seed Get Into Mimi's Garden? - Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Olivia Ep25
programme.desc: Olivia And The Family Photo - Mother is determined to take the perfect family Christmas photo in the middle of the summer. With the help of a snow machine, Olivia takes it upon herself to bring a little Christmas spirit to the photograph, and to Francine's backyard beach party next door.

programme.title: Olivia Ep26
programme.desc: Olivia Goes Camping - Francine comes along reluctantly on Olivia's family camping trip, and Olivia can't believe that anyone could be so unprepared for life in the great outdoors. But with a little hiking, bug-catching, and marshmallow roasting, Olivia is sure she can transform Francine from a novice to an expert camper.

programme.title: Olivia Ep27
programme.desc: Olivia The Nature Photographer - After snapping some great photos of her cat Edwin, Olivia thinks she's ready to photograph some real wild animals. She and Julian camp out in the backyard to wait for some, and sure enough they track down a mysterious animal in the bushes. But is it really a wild beast?

programme.title: Olivia Ep28
programme.desc: The Two Olivias - There's a new girl in Olivia's class and her name is...Olivia! Confusion ensues, and Olivia (the original Olivia) can't believe that she shares her name with another person. After a brief stint calling herself Pam, Olivia eventually decides that a two Olivia town might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep77
programme.desc: The Moving Finger Writes - Puss and the gang attempt to find Sino for help to stop the earthquakes and end up on a dangerous journey to The Forbidden Citadel

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep51
programme.desc: I, Maurice - When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep51
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 1) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep49
programme.desc: The Case Of BumpyS Burst Ball - It's a play date afternoon in Toy Green and everyone is there having fun. Noddy has got a new ball for Bumpy to replace his old one that went missing. But when he finds the new ball burst in his secret cupboard he decides to investigate. without letting Bumpy know what's happened. With Big Ears helping out by keeping Bumpy busy, Noddy and Revs are investigating against the clock to find out who burst the ball. When he finds Bumpy's original ball also burst and hidden in the kennel, he works out that the culprit is Bumpy himself! He hadn't wanted to tell anyone as he thought he'd get into trouble! Noddy reassures him that everything is okay and it's always better to tell the truth! Happily reassured, the little wooden dog happily starts playing again with his friends, using the burst ball as a Frisbee! Way to go, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep50
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Wings - The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden. And now she's planning on flying with them! Noddy, Bumpy and Revs rush to the DinoHills to save Smartysaurus before she has a nasty accident. The big dinosaur is very excited about flying. Noddy explains that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and Smartysaurus sadly gives them back. Clever Noddy has an idea though and later that evening, at the flying display, Smartysaurus, Toyland's first flying dinosaur makes her debut with a little help from the building crane and a big dino-harness! Noddy's saved the day again. Case closed!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep27
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each others (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.desc: Hard Luck Hardcase / Bee Story - Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.desc: Hide And Squeak - The twins are playing hide and seek with Pip but they all argue over who is the best at hiding? Can they make up their differences and play nicely together?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep117
programme.desc: Twinkle Twinkle - Buttercup and Daisy find some stars in flowertot garden. They think they have fallen out of the sky and try to return them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?
