programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Musical Instruments - Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies - Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save the Salmon - The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster/Winter Lights - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Pups Save a Monkey / Pups Save a Hoot - When Mandy the monkey escapes from her cage on the train, Ryder and the PAW Patrol are lead on a wild chase! // During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat / Pups Save a Toof - A baby Bat decides to take a nap hanging from the Town Halls bell and Mayor Goodway cant ring it. // Alex is afraid to go to the dentist, so Chase and the PAW Patrol work together to show Alex that fears can be overcome.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceaera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lorelai's Bracelet - Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dressing Up - Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Playgroup - Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The School Fete - Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Deep Sea Grand Prix - For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Great Space Race - Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day - Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay. // Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The PAW Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Blizzard Wizard - When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Super Baby! - When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island / The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it. // When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Happy Bestie-versary - Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save a Yodeler - When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and its up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie / Pups Save Ryder - Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. // Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Way of the Gran-Gran - Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-ms - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Toms who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Toms meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Blazing Amazing Stories - Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Rescue - All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105

But who broke it?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Alison in Wonderland! - Mail Carrier Molly is trying to deliver a Friendship Day card for someone named Alison in a place called Wonderland. But to do so, she'll have to get past the card-stealing Queen of Hearts, who has banned Friendship Day across the land!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep99
programme.desc: Running Around in Circles - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po run around in circles in Home Dome. The Noo-Noo joins in and the Teletubbies have fun chasing.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Teddy - Dee encourages a friend to say 'teddy' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a rainbow teddy, a flying teddy, a fluffy teddy and even a flower teddy!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kick Around - Team Tinpo are playing a game in their back yard when Doug-Po kicks the ball over a fence. How can they get their ball back?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep30
programme.desc: It's time to visit the dentist - JoJo has a check-up at the dentist and is hoping to earn a special sticker for looking after her teeth and keeping them clean and fresh!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Fun Factory - Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Ugli Fruit - Monty and Stan refuse to taste a strange-looking fruit, but Monty soon realises that you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep52
programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep51
programme.desc: The Action Hero Badge - The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket who always saves the day by smashing and crashing things. But there are other ways to save the day!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep50
programme.desc: The What Happened Badge - The Squirrels try and tell us what has just happened but are struggling to retell the story correctly.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Whale Rescue - After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Tomatina Festival, Buol, Spain - The Go Jetters get caught up in Spain's Tomatina Festival. The Tomato Battle takes place every August in the town of Bunol, near to Valencia.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Pirates - It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Fishing Cats - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the tropical island of Sri Lanka in Southern Asia on a global adventure in search of fishing cats.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Crane Flies - Rory and Sandy head to a nature reserve to spot crane flies. Chantelle meets a bug expert.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Catch of the Day - Benjamin, Ellie, Jaiden and Cara tackle physical games in a bid to win back Gem's jewels, and Captain Sinker decides she wants a seafood supper - so Cook teaches Line how to fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep49
programme.desc: The Building Block Badge - The Squirrels become architects so they can design, build and bring to life their very own clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep48

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep47
programme.desc: The Counting Badge - The Squirrels try the ultimate achievement of counting to 100 to earn their counting badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.desc: Kevin The Steamie - When Kevin is left in charge of the steamworks, he decides to use the space to practice his shunting skills - with disasterous results.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 21 - Essendon v West Coast Eagles Ep120
programme.desc: The first match in a Saturday Tripleheader as Essendon host the West Coast Eagles at Marvel Stadium. With just three games remaining after this one the Bombers look for a big win to boost their finals chances and percentage.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 21 - Hawthorn v Collingwood Ep121
programme.desc: Hawthorn versus Collingwood in Twilight Footy at the MCG. The young Hawks have shown promise and improvement this year but can they upset Premiership contenders the Magpies a month out from the Finals?

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 21 - Geelong v Port Adelaide Ep122
programme.desc: A Saturday Night Blockbuster that could shape the Finals race. Reigning Premiers Geelong host Port Adelaide as the Power look to maintain their midseason winning form just a month out from the Finals, with Top 2 on the line.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Australians - Wombat Kingdom S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Known as the bulldozers of the bush, wombats are Australia's largest burrowing animals. Aaron Pedersen explores how their digging has transformed landscapes and changed the face of the continent.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep14
programme.desc: This season we follow an epic global hunt for looted Cambodian treasure, investigate the far-right sovereign citizens of Germany trying to bring down their government, and in the Caribbean ask who should pay for past slavery.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep27
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep26
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep62
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.desc: We focus on Steve Leeper, the first American who had served as chairman of the Hiroshima Peace Culture Foundation, and has long been calling out how nuclear weapons have had disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: A prominent artist in Mongolia runs a school that accepts students with disabilities. The school has become a source of hope for many in Mongolia, where accessibility remains a challenge.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: In this special episode, Marc reports from a fishing port in Boso Peninsula in Chiba Prefecture. He makes an original bento inspired by a local specialty, sangayaki: grilled fish patties.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Suyama Chimi's eatery uses "substandard" vegetables donated by local farmers. Discolored or misshapen, their flavor and nutrition aren't affected. And, since costs are low, the meals are low-cost too.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep6

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov
